src:
Najveća pobeda Zvezdine dece, pade Totenhem! Crveno-beli blizu prolaza u drugu rundu...
Golove postigli Radulović i Piplica

06 Nov 2019


Slavi Zvezdini omladinci najveću pobedu u Ligi šampiona mladih! Pao je Totenhem - 2:0! Posle onakvog debakla pre dve nedelje malo ko je očekivao da deca srpskog šampiona mogu da se oporave, pre svega psihološki, međutim sve štop se događalo u Londonu ostalo je iza njih, smogli su snage, rešili da svima pokužu da ono nije bilo njihovo pravo lice i - uspeli su u tome. S ova tri boda Zvezda se vratila na drugo mesto u grupi B i sada ima sve u svojim rukama, gotovo da je na korak od prolaza u narednu rundu takmičenja.

Učenici Slavoljuba Đorđevića odigrali su neuporedivo bolje nego u Londonu, kada su se bukvalno raspali u jednom momentu i dozvolili sebi da prime čak devet komada. Utisak je da su oba tima odigrala taktički zrelije, pre svega crveno-beli, što posebno dobija na značaju ako se zna da srpski tim igra sa dosta mlađim igračima od svojih konkurenata u grupi.
Osim tri kornera koja su izveli u prvih 45 minuta Englezi gotovo da nisu ugrozili gol Andrije Katića. Ti pokušaji iz ugla i jedan udarac iz daljine... S druge strane Zvezda mnogo opasnija. Doduše, samo jedna ozbiljna prilika preko Miloša Pantovića u 39. minutu, a sve posle lepog proigravanja Matića, međutim delovalo je da samo nijanse dele domaće od vođstva.   
Andrija Radulović i Borisav Burmaz bili su najopasniji po gol Totenhema u tim momentima, da bi u 44. minutu Martin Novaković pokušao sa 16 metara i naterao De Bija da zagreje dlanove. 
I jedni i drugi krenuli su vrlo oprezno u nastavku. Gotovo bez trunke rirzika, zbog čega su izostala uzbuđenja u dva šesnaesterca. Jedna od retkih prilika u nastavku zbila se u 69. minutu i nju su crveno-beli iskoristili. Jedan odličan pas glavom, rutinska realizacija i to je bilo dovoljno za najveći uspeh Zvezdinih omladinaca. Divno su sarađivali Ilija Babić i Andrija Radulović. Ovaj drugugi pobegao je odbrani Totenhema, našao se dosta iskosa u odnosu na gol, ali njegova levica bila je neumoljiva - 1:0.
Bunili su se gosti dosta glasno, tražili od sudije da poništi gol zbog ofsajda, ali promene odluke nije bilo. Austrijanac Gišamer pokazao je na centar. Odmah posle gola Slavoljub Đorđević je reagovao izmenama, učvrstio sredinu i zadnju liniju i praktično zatvorio sve prilaze svom golu. Ostalo je dobrih dvadesetak minuta do kraja, ali mladi Pevci osim jednog udaraca Beneta u 90. minutu - i odbrane Katića - nisu stvorili nijednu ozbiljnu priliku.
Zvezda se dugo branila, nije trpela veliki pritisak, ali se povukla, da bi u sudijskoj nadoknadi rešila sve dileme oko pobednika. Kada su krenuli na sve ili ništa Englezi su kažnjeni. Šmekerski pas Babića petom u šesnaestercu Totenhema, na pravom mestu našao se Petar Pipica koji samo što je ušao sa klupe i - 2:0.     
U prvoj utakmici grupe B, u Minhenu, Bajern je vrlo lako izašao na kraj sa Olimpijakosom. Nemci su slavili sa 6:0, ali takvom rezultatu u dobroj meri doprineo je rani crveni karton za goste, još u prvom poluvremenu. U nastavku Grci nisu imali nikakve šanse, pa ostaju zakucani za poslednju poziciju.  


CRVENA ZVEZDA - TOTENHEM 2:0/Radulović 69, Piplica 90+3/


Beograd.Stadion Voždovca.Sudija: Sebastijan Gišamer (Austrija)

Crvena zvezda: Katić, Mitrović, Blagojević, Lukić, Milikić, Novaković, Matić (od 67. Miletić), Pantović (od 69. Bačanin), Radulović, Burmaz, Babić.
Totenhem: De Bi - Ejoma, Sirkin, Binks - Benet, Volkot, Bouden, Oukli But, Vajt - Robson (od 67. Vitaker), Markandej.


GRUPA B - 4. KOLO

Bajern - Olimpijakos 6:0 (1:0)
Crvena zvezda - Totenhem 2:0 (0:0)/Radulović 69, Piplica 90+3/
text:
The biggest victory for the Children's Star, Tottenham falls! Red and white near the pass to round two ...
Goals were scored by Radulovic and Piplica

06 Nov 2019


Celebrate Star Youth's Biggest Champions League Win! Tottenham fell - 2-0! After that debacle two weeks ago, few expected the children of the Serbian champion to recover, first of all psychologically, but all the action that took place in London remained behind them; and - they succeeded in doing so. With these three points, the Star returned to second place in Group B and now has everything in its hands, almost a step away from passing into the next round of competition.

Slavoljub Djordjevic's students performed far better than in London when they literally fell apart at one point and allowed themselves to receive as many as nine pieces. The impression is that both teams played tactically more mature, especially red and white, which is especially important if one knows that the Serbian team plays with much younger players than their competitors in the group.
With the exception of three corner kicks made in the first 45 minutes, the English almost did not threaten the goal of Andrija Katic. These attempts from the corner and one shot from afar ... On the other hand, the Star is much more dangerous. Admittedly, there was only one serious opportunity through Milos Pantovic in the 39th minute, and all after a nice play by Matic, however, it seemed that only the nuances shared the home from the lead.
Andrija Radulovic and Borisav Burmaz were the most dangerous for Tottenham's goal in those moments, in the 44th minute Martin Novakovic tried from 16 meters and forced De Bij to warm his palms.
Both went very carefully below. Almost without a whiff of rice, which caused no excitement in the two sixes. One of the few opportunities below happened in the 69th minute and was used by the Red and Whites. One great dog head, routine realization and that was enough for the biggest success of Star Youth. Ilija Babic and Andrija Radulovic worked wonderfully. The second one escaped the defense of Tottenham, found a lot of leap in relation to the goal, but his left was relentless - 1: 0.
The guests were complaining loudly, asking the referee to cancel the goal because of the offside, but there was no change in the decision. Gichamer of Austria pointed to the center. Immediately after the goal, Slavoljub Djordjevic reacted with changes, solidifying the middle and back line and practically closing all approaches to his goal. About 20 minutes left until the end, but the young Singers, with the exception of one shot by Bennet in the 90th minute - and Katic's defense - did not create any serious opportunity.
The star defended herself for a long time, did not suffer much pressure, but withdrew to resolve all the dilemmas about the winner in the referee's compensation. When all or nothing went, the English were punished. Babic's smacker dog in the fifth in Tottenham's sixteenth, in the right place was Petar Pipica who just came off the bench and - 2: 0.
In the first Group B game in Munich, Bayern easily managed to handle Olympiakos. The Germans celebrated with 6: 0, but such a result was greatly contributed by an early red card for the guests, back in the first half. Below, the Greeks have had no chance, so they remain nailed to the last position.


RED STAR - TOTENHEM 2: 0 / Radulovic 69, Piplica 90 + 3 /


Belgrade.Stepion of Vozdovac.Sudia: Sebastian Gisamer (Austria)

Red Star: Katic, Mitrovic, Blagojevic, Lukic, Milikic, Novakovic, Matic (since 67th Miletic), Pantovic (since 69th Bacanin), Radulovic, Burmaz, Babic.
Tottenham: De Bi - Ejoma, Sirkin, Binks - Bennett, Wolcott, Bouden, Oakley Butte, White - Robson (from 67th Whitaker), Markandei.


GROUP B - ROUND 4

Bayern Munich - Olympiacos 6-0 (1-0)
Red Star - Tottenham 2: 0 (0: 0) / Radulovic 69, Piplica 90 + 3 /
